sentences.en: 'set a trap for him to walk into, eh? "
sentences.cn: “ 设下圈套给自己钻, 是 吗 ? ”

sentences.en: 'so the women believe what Chien Pao - sheng tells them, eh?
'so you lost your place because you got sick, eh ? "
sentences.cn: “ 这么说,你因为生病,所以丢了工作, 是 吗 ?

sentences.en: " But our Defarge,'said Jacques Three, " is undoubtedly a good Republican? Eh? "
sentences.cn: “ 可是我们的德伐日, ”雅克三号说, “ 无疑是个优秀的共和分子,是 么 ? ”

sentences.en: " Well, " he said , looking the drummer over, " rosy as ever, eh? "
sentences.cn: “ 嘿, " 他打量着推销员说, " 气色和往常一样好, 是吧?

sentences.en: "He's um ill in bed." — "Eh?" — "He's ill in bed."
sentences.cn: “嗯，他生病卧床。”——“什么？”——“他生病卧床。”

sentences.en: eh up, I'm talking to you!.
Eh? She’s got how many children?
Let's drink to his memory, eh?
sentences.cn: 让我们为缅怀他而干杯，好吗？

sentences.en: Let's talk all about it outside, eh?
So you are going to start next week , eh?
sentences.cn: 那么你们下星期就要出发了, 是 吗 ?

sentences.en: So you won't go tomorrow , eh?
Still sprawling there she asked, " Well? Come for another eh? "
sentences.cn: 依旧斜着身,她说: “ 怎样 ?吃出甜头来了是怎着? ”

sentences.en: There's only one cure for the thunderbolt, eh, Calo? "
sentences.cn: 晴天霹雳引起的相思病,也只有一种疗法了, 嗯, 加洛你看 呢 ? ”

sentences.en: What did you tell me, eh?
sentences.cn: 你当初是怎么跟我说的?

sentences.en: Why haven't you gone yet, eh?

phrases.tran_cn: (北英格兰)［表示问候、惊讶或用于唤起别人注意］ 哎

trans.tran_cn: （用以表示惊讶、疑问、征求同意或要求重说一遍）嗯，啊
trans.tran_en: used when you want someone to repeat something because you did not hear it
